textBotWelcomeMsg: Welcome Dawasco, How Can I help you?
textAddPhoneNum: Please enter your phone number to stay updated about the problem progress
textPhoneNumReceivedNote: Thank You. We will reach you through phone number %s
textSelectProblemService: Please select the type of problem you want to report.
textShareLocation:
We will now need to collect your location to know where the problem is.
Please click the Share location button so that we can get your coordinates.
You need to enable your GPS to do it.
To continue without submiting your location, type quit.
textAddProblemMoreInfo: More information about the problem will help us solve it faster. Can you add some additional details?
textUploadProblemPicture: Please upload a picture of the problem
